div.p: The Peter Hewitt Incremental Scholarship Honor is designed to provide opportunities for students who have been identified as leaders at the University of Nebraska Kearney, and is amongst the most prestigious honors awarded at UNK. Prospective students are chosen by a committee of students and faculty based on academic standing, community involvement, as well as financial need. Recipients of this scholarship will receive a tuition waiver up to 12 credit hours per semester, which may be renewed annually.
